body:
Wow he takes literally the most logical path ever for a relationship by making sure he himself is ready financially and mentally but she wants to race to marriage fast as possible. He doesn't want to race? Well might as well try and find someone who will. Changed my mind lets force him to have a child, now that's an idea!

What the actual hell, you leave to cheat then it's over. A person like that doesn't deserve another chance. Impulsive, reckless, manipulative and a liar to top it off. What an amazing catch.

Its all a misunderstanding, the BF was gonna propose but the ring took time(both financially and to get the right one) he couldn’t outright say it so he made up excuse , she took it as him not being sure of their future so she went to the mixer to make him jealous upon realizing she cant do it she goes back(when in NTR hentai does the person cheating come back EARLY if anything its also late if not the next day)
Hot.
Why so serious, minna? Lmao

So no, this is not NTR, but it's not wholesome either. It's the story of a manipulative girl who coerced her bf into marrying her with the threat of cheating. Like, he legit started changing his tune the moment she said "I'll slip away from your grasp" or something like that (she even said something similar like three times).

Like, do you guys seriously not understand how fucked up all of this is? People saying it'll turn NTR aren't saying it necessarily because they WANT it to, but because IT COULD, and it's even kinda probable, and I know it won't happen, but if this were a realistic scenario, it would happen. What's she gonna do the next time they have a big fight? When she's feeling jealous? Or when he works too much and can't have as much sex? Do you legit not see how likely she is to pull shit like this again, and actually going through with it since she was already forgiven once? Forgiven AND REWARDED.

Then when her bf noticed something was clearly wrong, he asked her, and she kept it hidden still until he had to pry it out of her. Then she has THE GALL to say she wanted to, get this, "get back at him" for not feeling ready to marry. I cannot stress enough how fucked up that phrase alone is, let alone the actions themselves. She did stop herself before going too far and I believe it, but going through all the motions of thinking, planning and GOING to a mixer and getting drunk just to "get back" at your partner cause you're mad at them is an incredibly scummy thing to do. Oh, but that's not the end of it. Then she not only did NOT show remorse but doubled down and told him he'd lose her if he didn't step up. Bros, she legit threatened  (no matter how playfully) to leave him if he doesn't do the thing he's not feeling ready for... And that's not all. She then proceeded to force bareback sex on him to get pregnant and force him to marry her.

I think it's clear that she didn't cheat and was just feeling guilty over it all, BUT it's also clear that she's not a good girlfriend and those are some MAJOR red flags here. Like others say, thinking of cheating over an argument is wrong, but that's not the only thing that happened. She PLANNED and WENT to a mixer, a party whose purpose is specifically to pair up with strangers for either sex or possibly a relationship. She got DRUNK in said party and she eventually did come back to fuck her bf out of guilt but without confessing her thoughts of betrayal (and actions, really, just because she didn't go through with it doesn't mean she didn't start it)... cont
Holy shit, almost went to ntr
My Lord Emperor…
She don't deserve that ring she almost cheat on him just from a misunderstanding what can you hope in a future
Mf really just ignored cheating flags, Should've spanked and torture her a bit since she's drunk so she's probably gonna forget it next day.

Calm your tits people, she did not cheat. She just went to a mixer, its just a group of people meeting with each other. Its clearly evident that she did not go to any of the guys and went straight home. I get that it's a possible start of a ntr doujin but it didnt go that way. The only thing I want to see is that mc setting some rules or maybe an agreement so that it will not be repeated everytime they fight.

I feel bad for the guy. I'd have stopped right as soon as she said she went to a mixer bc if she's angry enough about marriage to do that, then she'll never be ready.

Hold off on marriage, folks. Take as long as you need, it's your life, your choice.

TLDR: ffs leave the girl alone, she won't cuck the mc, you got it?

1. Girl's POV (Part 1):- Why doesn't Yuuta want to marry me? Sth must be wrong (i feel so insecure that he might be stolen by another girl). I get into a fight, now I am extremely angry with my Yuuta. Out of anger, I decide to go to a mixer. Baka Yuuta, this time I might actually break up with you. Get ready to see me with another guy, you'll know what you missed. After going to mixer, I immediately realise no way in hell i should be here, so I leave. Bcz, I love Yuuta, I cannot see myself with any other guy. In my mind I was like: What have I done! What was I going to do?

2. Li'l Summery: She thought of breaking up but never had guts to actually do it. She wasn't "unsure" whether she should continue with Yuuta, she decided that Yuuta was hers right in the mixer (see page 21)

3. Girl's POV (Part 2):- 
I return home half drunk, I will give Yuuta a good time and forget about what happened. I start to have sex with Yuuta (just to save myself by thinking i am atoning). Yuuta finds out everything. In that situation, I take advantage of it by saying "what would you do if i was taken by another guy". He says he'll never allow it (that's what i always want to hear from you Yuuta). I want him to always hold me tight, so I say that "(PAGE 15)".

4. Disclaimer:
After arriving home, the girl wanted to treat the matter cowardly and go as far as hiding it. At that moment she was like "It was just a mixer, I didn't really cheat on him". But it was ONLY for the time being. You know for sure that after some time she would've come to realize what an awful thing she had done and refrain from doing again, she would've even opened upto him about it in the future (had it been left untouched)

5. Girl's POV (Part 3):-
I "force" him to agree to marry me asap by attempting to get pregnant (cz we'll probably be grannies when he proposes me, so i have to take responsibility by making him propose now, this is my chance)[these decisions should not be made out of the blue, but the girl was ready and it is "hentai" where child support is ez]. We are making so much love we both spill everything from our heart, we get more closer than we've ever been. Next day Yuuta proposes me, I am the happiest girl in za warudo. (little timeskip) I am living happily with Yuuta. I will never leave him. Rarely, I remember the memory of the "mixer", gosh I was such an idiot to even think of that. Yuuta, you and I are perfect for each other, never believe anything else.
@Dr Free I agree those are definitely some red flags. Who could say for sure that she definitely wont do it again when she is angry at him again now that you know she has done it once.

Still, I definitely do not agree with what the FemC did.
